channel.title: Marion County Rescue Squad | Fairmont WV | Facebook RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an RSS feed of the three most recent posts at https://www.facebook.com/MarionCountyRescueSquad/

item.title: MCRS would like to say congratulations to Brianna Pethtel fo
item.description: MCRS would like to say congratulations to Brianna Pethtel for passing her NREMT Paramedic Test!

item.title: Staff enjoying the new deck! Huge thank you to Recovery Con
item.description: Staff enjoying the new deck! Huge thank you to Recovery Construction! We love it !
